ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
// java.toast(source.getVariable())
let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}

let getLatestChapterTitle = (book_id) => {
    const directory = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://fanqienovel.com/api/reader/directory/detail?bookId=' + book_id)).data.chapterListWithVolume
    java.log(JSON.stringify(directory[directory.length - 1]))
    return directory[directory.length - 1].title
}

let formatWordCount = (i) => {
    let w
    if (i > 100000000) w = (i / 100000000).toFixed(2) + "亿"
    else if (i > 10000) w = (i / 10000).toFixed(2) + "万"
    else w = i
    return w + "字"
}

var w = JSON.parse(result).data
// java.log(w)
let list = []
w.forEach(i => {
    list.push(i.book_data[0])
})
// java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
let res = []

list.forEach(i => {
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i))
    var b = {
        name: i.book_name,
        author: i.author,
        intro: i.abstract,
        cover: replaceCover(i.thumb_url),
        tags: [i.score, i.category, i.tags],
        word_count: `${formatWordCount(i.word_number)}, ${(i.creation_status == 1) ? "连载中" : "已完结"}`,
        url: 'https://fanqienovel.com/page/' + i.book_id
    }
    res.push(b)
    if (i.book_name != i.original_book_name) {
      var b2 = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(b))
      b2.name = i.original_book_name
      b2.url = b2.url + "?fromName=" + i.original_book_name
      res.push(b2)
    }
})

res
</js>

// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];
  let resultData = JSON.parse(src).data;
  let data;
  if (resultData.book_shelf_info) {
    data = resultData.book_shelf_info;
    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );
    // java.log(booksData)
    let books =  JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
      let d = books[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        url: `https://fanqienovel.com/page/${d.book_id}`,
      });
    }
    } else list = []
  } else if (resultData.data.book_info) {
    data = resultData.data.book_info;
    for (let i in data) {
      let d = data[i];
      lastChapterTitle =
        d.last_chapter_title +
        "·" +
        java.timeFormat(d.last_publish_time * 1000);
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        word_number: d.word_number,
        lastChapterTitle: lastChapterTitle,
        tags: d.tags,
        url: `https://fanqienovel.com/page/${d.book_id}`,
      });
    }
  } else if (Array.isArray(resultData.data)) {
    data = resultData.data;
    for (let i in data) {
      let d = data[i];
      lastChapterTitle =
        d.last_chapter_title +
        "·" +
        java.timeFormat(d.last_publish_time * 1000);
      list.push({
        src: d,
        author: d.author,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        word_number: d.word_number,
        lastChapterTitle: lastChapterTitle,
        tags: d.tags,
        url: `https://fanqienovel.com/page/${d.book_id}`,
      });
    }
  }
  list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let variable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": true,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": true,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": true
    }
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name).replace("：默认", ""),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = `https://api.mgz6.cc/content/${c.itemId}`;
      c.vip = c.isChapterLock && c.isPaidPublication
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let is_off_shelf = false
if (!baseUrl.match(/https:\/\/api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com\/reading\/bookapi\/multi-detail\/v\/.*book_id=.*/)) {
  var bookid = baseUrl.includes("fanqienovel.com") ? baseUrl.match(/\d+/)[0] : baseUrl.match(/book_?id\=\d+/)[0].replace(/book_?id\=/g, "")
  baseUrl = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=${bookid}`
  result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
  java.log("≡获取成功(url统一化): " + baseUrl)
}
var res = JSON.parse(result).data[0]
if (res.tomato_book_status == 3) { // 下架书籍
  is_off_shelf = true
  baseUrl = `https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/book/directory/list/v1/?device_platform=android&version_code=600&novel_version=&app_name=news_article&version_name=6.0.0&app_version=6.0.0aid=520&channel=1&device_type=MI+13&os_api=25&os_version=10&book_id=${res.book_id}`
  result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
  java.log("≡获取成功(下架书籍信息): " + baseUrl)
  res = JSON.parse(result).data.book_info
}
var read_count=res.read_count
if(read_count>10000)read_count=(Number(read_count)/10000).toFixed(2)+'万'
var u = String("https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin/" + res.thumb_uri)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
})
var u = uArr2.join("/").replace("/origin/origin", "/origin")
var tsec = res.last_publish_time % 60
tsec = (String(tsec).length == 1) ? "0" + tsec : tsec
var roles = JSON.parse(res.roles ? res.roles : "[]")
var data = {
  name: res.book_name,
  author: res.author,
  kind: [(res.score != 0) ? res.score + "分" : "暂无评分"].concat(JSON.parse(res.category_v2).map(item => item.Name)).join(","),
  words: res.word_number,
  last: res.last_chapter_title,
  intro: `\u3000\u3000🔖 更新时间：${java.timeFormat(res.last_publish_time * 1000) + ":" + tsec}${is_off_shelf ? ", 已下架" : ((res.creation_status == 1) ? ", 连载中" : ((res.creation_status == 0 || res.creation_status == -1) ? ", 已完结" : ((res.creation_status == 4 ? ", 已断更" : ""))))}
${(res.book_name != res.original_book_name && book.name == res.book_name) ? ("本书原名：" + res.original_book_name) : ""}
${(res.book_name != res.original_book_name && book.name == res.original_book_name) ? "本书现名：" + res.book_name : ""}
‎
${(res.source != res.author) ? "🔗 源站：" + res.source : ""}
${read_count.toString().trim() ? "📖 阅读：" + read_count : ""}
${roles.join("") ? "👤 主角：" + roles.join(", ") : ""}
‎
🏷️ 简介：${res.abstract}
‎
🔖 开书时间：${res.create_time.split('+')[0].replace('T', ' ').replace(/-/g, '/')}
${res.copyright_info.replace('，如有任何疑问，请通过“我的-意见反馈”告知我们', '')}
`,
  toc: `https://fanqienovel.com/api/reader/directory/detail?bookId=${res.book_id}`,
  cover: u
}
data
</js>

ruleContent.content:
var data = JSON.parse(result).data // java.log(data.content) let cnt try { // 处理漫画 var article_content = data.content.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/)[1].toString() article_content = article_content.replace(/\&/g, "\"").replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") cnt = JSON.parse(article_content) var res = "" cnt.skeleton.data.forEach((k) => { res += `` }) cnt = res } catch (e) { // java.log(e) cnt = data.content.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/)[1].toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "") } cnt

ruleContent.content:
data.content@js:
result ? String(java.base64Decode(result)).replace(/<h1>.+?<\/h1>/, '') : ' 付费章节，换源阅读！';

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

var pattern3 = /len\":\s(.*?)\}/g;
var pattern4 = /(url_kv\":\s\")|(\")/g;
var pattern5 = /(name\":\s\")|(\")/g;
var pattern6 = /(len\":\s)|(\})/g;
var urlheader = 'https://h-comic.com/comics/';
list = [];
var urlkv;
var cname;
var len;
while ((urlkv = pattern1.exec(result)) !== null) {
    cname = pattern2.exec(result);
    len = pattern3.exec(result);
    urlkv = urlkv[0].replace(pattern4, '');
    cname = cname[0].replace(pattern5, '');
    len = len[0].replace(pattern6, '');
    href = "https://la2.bqg123a.top/load_chapter/" + urlkv + ".js?t=" + len + "&tk=913" + ",{\"headers\":{\"Referer\":\"https://mianfei22.com/\"}}";

}

ruleContent.content:
<js>

cid = baseUrl.match(/-(\d+)/)[1];
	let token = java.webView("", baseUrl, "sessionStorage.getItem('token')");
	
header =
	{"headers":	{"referer":baseUrl,
	"token":token,"client":"h5"}};
	
url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/novel/chapterGetInfo?cid="+cid+"&nid="+java.get("nid")+","+JSON.stringify(header);

html = java.ajax(url);

chapterInfo=JSON.parse(html).data.chapterInfo;
postscript=chapterInfo.postscript;
if(chapterInfo.content==""){
	result = "订阅本章需  "+chapterInfo.chapterPrice+ "玉佩"
	}else{
content=java.aesBase64DecodeToString(chapterInfo.content,"u0LRrbu$Enm84koA","AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding","$h$b3!iGzsYnnshj")
postscript==""?content:content+"作者有话说："+postscript;
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
try{
	con=result.match(/Content='([^']+)'/)[1];
	up=result.match(/update='([^']+)'/)[1];
	jm(con,up)}
catch(e){
	java.getString('id.nr1@p@html',result);
}
</js>##<p[^>]+>[^>]+>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "💰":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

bookSourceComment: 设置源变量填写 1:是,0:否 是否启用webView 默认不启用（登录以后正文获取失败可以启用试试，保存后记得更新目录，否则无效）

n=0;//默认选择源

x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;

result.new_title = $[x].new_title;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若书籍ID为0 (9x除外)，则为第三方网站。\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].name+'】\n书籍ID：'+$[i].internal_book_id+'\n选用率：'+$[i].show_text+' \n源地址： '+$[i].chapter_list_url+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].new_title;
	}
result.description += y
}

try{ book_id=$[x].internal_book_id; }
 catch(e) { book_id = id;}
 
 if(x==0&&book_id==0){ 
 	book_id = id;
 	java.put('book_id',book_id);
 	result.tocUrl = `/cdn/book/chapterList/${book_id}.html`;
 }
else if(x!=0&&book_id==0) {
	 tUrl = $[x].chapter_list_url;

	}
else if(book_id!=0){ 
	java.put('book_id',book_id);

	}

result = JSON.stringify(result);

if(baseUrl.match(/cdn\/book\/chapterList/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
data = JSON.parse(decode(result)).result.list;
length = data.length;
chapterList = [];
for(var i = 0; i < length; i ++){
	name = "🏮〖"+data[i].name+"〗🏮";
	chapterList.push({
			text: name,
			href: null,
			volume: true
	})	
	data[i].list.forEach(($) => {						
		text = $.name;
		id = $.id;
		book_id = java.get('book_id');
		//book_id = baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+).html/)[1];
    href = `/cdn/book/content/${book_id}/${id}.html`;   
    chapterList.push({
			text: text,
			href: href	
	})
	})	
	}
chapterList
}
else{
	chapterList = [];
	datas = java.getElement("dd@a").toArray();
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(chapterList));
	for (var i = 0; i < datas.length; i++) {
    text = datas[i].text();
			hre = baseUrl.split(',')[0]+datas[i].attr("href");
			d=String(hre).split('\/');
list=[];
d.forEach((s, index)=>{ 
	 if (list.indexOf(s) == -1) {
 	   list.push(s);      }
		
		});
		href = list.toString().replace(/,/g,"/");
						
     chapterList.push({
		 	 text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
   };
	chapterList
	}
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
h = String(source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1]);
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>
